scripts.start: (trap 'kill 0' SIGINT; npm run frontend:start & npm run backend:start & wait)
scripts.serve: (trap 'kill 0' SIGINT; npm run frontend:serve & npm run backend:serve & wait)
scripts.build: tsc; npm run frontend:build && npm run backend:build
scripts.frontend:start: npm run frontend:build && npm run frontend:serve
scripts.backend:start: npm run backend:build && npm run backend:serve
scripts.precommit: (trap 'kill 0' SIGINT; (npm run fmt:silent && echo 'prettier finished') & (npm run lint && echo 'linter finished') & wait)
